name: A Yandere Fairytale
description:
Your beloved partner has just got home from work, and decided to read you a bedtime story before you retire for the night.

But...

Some details of this story sound... unsettlingly familiar.

✧༺☆༻∞　★　∞༺☆༻✧

This visual novel is entirely voice acted, and can be enjoyed by clicking through, or on auto, but some dialogue will advance automatically regardless.

For the best experience, it is advised that you do not alter the Text Speed, as it is precisely timed to the dialogue.
